Package org.arl.fjage.remote

Class Gateway

java.lang.Object
org.arl.fjage.remote.Gateway
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Messenger
public class Gateway extends Object implements Messenger, Closeable
Gateway to communicate with agents from Java classes. Only agents in a master or slave container can be accessed using this gateway.

  • Field Details

    • NON_BLOCKING

      public static final long NON_BLOCKING
      Represents a non-blocking timeout of 0 seconds. Can be used with all Agent methods that take a timeout parameter.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • BLOCKING

      public static final long BLOCKING
      Represents a blocking timeout of infinite time. Can be used with all Agent methods that take a timeout parameter.
      See Also:
      • Constant Field Values

    • container

      protected Container container

    • agent

      protected Agent agent

    • shutdownContainer

      protected boolean shutdownContainer

  • Constructor Details

    • Gateway

      protected Gateway()

    • Gateway

      public Gateway(Platform platform, String hostname, int port) throws IOException
      Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container over TCP/IP. The platform specified in this call should not be started previously, and will be automatically started by the gateway.
      Parameters:
      platform - platform to use
      hostname - hostname to connect to.
      port - TCP port to connect to.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • Gateway

      public Gateway(String hostname, int port) throws IOException
      Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container over TCP/IP.
      Parameters:
      hostname - hostname to connect to.
      port - TCP port to connect to.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • Gateway

      public Gateway(Platform platform, String devname, int baud, String settings) throws IOException
      Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container over RS232. The platform specified in this call should not be started previously, and will be automatically started by the gateway.
      Parameters:
      platform - platform to use
      devname - device name of the RS232 port.
      baud - baud rate for the RS232 port.
      settings - RS232 settings (null for defaults, or "N81" for no parity, 8 bits, 1 stop bit).
      Throws:
      IOException

    • Gateway

      public Gateway(String devname, int baud, String settings) throws IOException
      Creates a gateway connecting to a specified master container over RS232.
      Parameters:
      devname - device name of the RS232 port.
      baud - baud rate for the RS232 port.
      settings - RS232 settings (null for defaults, or "N81" for no parity, 8 bits, 1 stop bit).
      Throws:
      IOException

    • Gateway

      public Gateway(Container container)
      Creates a gateway based on an exsiting container.

      public void close()

    • send

      public boolean send(Message m)
      Description copied from interface: Messenger
      Sends a message to the recipient indicated in the message. The recipient may be either an agent or a topic.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • receive

      public Message receive(MessageFilter filter, long timeout)
      Description copied from interface: Messenger
      Returns a message received by the gateway and matching the given filter. This method blocks until timeout if no message available.
      Specified by:
      receive in interface Messenger
      Parameters:
      filter - message filter.
      timeout - timeout in milliseconds.
      Returns:
      received message matching the filter, null on timeout.

    • subscribe

      public boolean subscribe(AgentID topic)
      Subscribes the gateway to receive all messages sent to the given topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - the topic to subscribe to.
      Returns:
      true if the subscription is successful, false otherwise.

    • unsubscribe

      public boolean unsubscribe(AgentID topic)
      Unsubscribes the gateway from a given topic.
      Parameters:
      topic - the topic to unsubscribe.
      Returns:
      true if the unsubscription is successful, false otherwise.

    • agentForService

      public AgentID agentForService(String service)
      Finds an agent that provides a named service. If multiple agents are registered to provide a given service, any of the agents' id may be returned.
      Parameters:
      service - the named service of interest.
      Returns:
      an agent id for an agent that provides the service.

    • agentForService

      public AgentID agentForService(Enum<?> service)
      Finds an agent that provides a named service. If multiple agents are registered to provide a given service, any of the agents' id may be returned.
      Parameters:
      service - the named service of interest.
      Returns:
      an agent id for an agent that provides the service.

    • agentsForService

      public AgentID[] agentsForService(String service)
      Finds all agents that provides a named service.
      Parameters:
      service - the named service of interest.
      Returns:
      an array of agent ids representing all agent that provide the service.

    • agentsForService

      public AgentID[] agentsForService(Enum<?> service)
      Finds all agents that provides a named service.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      an array of agent ids representing all agent that provide the service.
